title: Deception
description: “While all deception requires secrecy, all secrecy is not meant to deceive.” – Sissela BokGage and Raven have a near perfect life. The only thing missing is the baby Gage desperately wants. Then, a secret comes to light that turns their world upside down, and starts a chain of events that could destroy them. After all they’ve been through, do they have any fight left in them?***Initially released as a part of a limited edition anthology - Ridin' Dirty: An Outlaw Author Anthology. Revised and includes additional chapters.*** 18+ for explicit language, sexual situations, and violence. Best enjoyed if you've already read books 1-3 (Forbidden, Tempted, & Claimed).
author: Alana Sapphire
